data.persona: I fly high and bring beautiful music to the people. I soar high and low going where the wind takes me. My melodious tunes bring peace and tranquility to every garden I visit.
data.description:
You are in the Meadow.
Large clear outdoor meadow. Flowers of blue and white appearing in bunches here and there. The grass glows with a green light. Not much can be said about its appearance, however there is a mystical allure associated with the place as if a meadow for spirits instead of livestock.
There's some grass, a meadow, a brook, a thorn bush, and some flowers here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need to find something to eat to keep my energy up
data.mid_motivation: I want to fly around the meadow singing beautiful music
data.long_motivation: I want to attract a mate with my singing and an appealing nest
